Verses: 1 ardhasashtaa Raajaavin Irubadhaam Varusham Nisaan Maadhaththile, Dhraatcharasam Raajaavukku Munbaaga Vaiththirukkaiyil, Naan Adhai Eduththu Avarukkuk Koduththen; Naan Mun Orupodhum Avar Samugaththil Dhukkamaayirundhadhillai.
2 appozhudhu Raajaa Ennaippaarththu: Nee Dhukkamugamaayirukkiradhu Enna? Unakku Vyaadhiyillaiye, Idhu Manadhin Dhukkame Ozhiya Verondrum Alla Endraar; Appozhudhu Naan Migavum Bayandhu,

3 raajaavai Nokki: Raajaa Endraikkum Vaazhga; En Pidhaakkalin Kallaraigal Irukkum Sthalamaagiya Nagaram Paazhaanadhum, Adhin Vaasalgal Akkiniyaal Sutterikkappattadhumaaik Kidakkumpodhu, Naan Dhukkamugaththodu Iraadhiruppadhu Eppadi Endren.
4 appozhudhu Raajaa Ennaip Paarththu: Nee Ketkira Kaariyam Enna Endraar. Appozhudhu Naan: Paralogaththin Dhevanai Nokki Jebampanni,

5 raajaavaip Paarththu: Raajaavukku Siththamaayirundhu, Adiyenukku Umadhu Samugaththil Dhayai Kidaiththadhaanaal, En Pidhaakkalin Kallaraigalilirukkum Pattanaththaik Kattumpadi, Yoodhaa Dhesaththukku Neer Ennai Anuppavendikkollugiren Endren.

6 appozhudhu Raajasthreeyum Pakkaththil Utkaarndhirundhaal. Raajaa Ennaip Paarththu: Un Prayaanam Eththanai Naal Sellum, Nee Eppozhudhu Thirumbivaruvaai Endru Kettaar. Ivvalavukaalam Sellumendru Naan Raajaavukku Sonnapodhu, Ennai Anuppa Avarukku Siththamaayitru.

7 pinnum Naan Raajaavaip Paarththu Raajaavukku Siththamaayirundhaal, Naan Yoodhaadhesaththukkup Poichcherumattum, Nadhikku Appuraththilirukkira Dhesaadhipadhigal Ennai Vazhivittanuppumpadikku Avargalukkuk Kadidhangal Kodukkumpadikkum,

8 dhevaalayaththukku Irukkira Aranin Kadhavu Velaikkum, Nagara Alangaththin Velaikkum, Naan Thangappogira Veettin Velaikkum Vendiya Marangalai Raajaavin Vanaththuk Kaavalaalanaagiya Aasaab Enakkuk Kodukkumpadikkum, Avanukkum Oru Kadidham Kattalaiyidappaduvadhaaga Endren; En Dhevanudaiya Dhayavulla Karam Enmel Irundhapadiyaal, Raajaa Avaigalai Enakkuk Kattalaiyittaar.

9 appadiye Naan Nadhikku Appuraththilirukkira Dhesaadhipadhigalidaththukku Vandhu, Raajaavin Kadidhangalai Avargalukkuk Koduththen; Raajaa Ennodekooda Raanuva Servaikkaararaiyum, Kudhiraiveeraraiyum Anuppiyirundhaar.

10 idhai Oroniyanaana Sanpallaaththum, Ammoniyanaana Thobiyaa Ennum Oozhiyakkaaranum Kettapodhu, Isravel Puththirarin Nanmaiyai Visaarikka Oruvan Vandhaan Enbadhu Avargalukku Migavum Visanamaayirundhadhu.
11 naan Erusalemukku Vandhu, Ange Moondrunaal Irundhapinbu,

12 naan Sila Manusharaik Koottikkondu, Raaththiriyil Ezhundhu Nagara Sodhanai Seydhen; Aanaalum Erusalemukkaaga Seyyumpadi En Dhevan En Manadhile Vaiththadhai Naan Oruvarukkum Arivikkavillai; Naan Erippona Mirugameyallaamal Veroru Mirugamum Ennodirundhadhillai.

13 naan Andru Raaththiri Pallaththaakkin Vaasalvazhiyaaip Purappattu, Valusarppath Thuravaik Kadandhu, Kuppaimettu Vaasalukku Vandhu, Erusalemil Idindhupona Alangaththaiyum, Akkiniyaal Sutterikkappatta Adhin Vaasalgalaiyum Paarvaiyitten.
14 avvidaththai Vittu Ooruni Vaasalandaikkum, Raajaavin Kulaththandaikkum Ponen; Naan Eriyirundha Mirugam Ange Nadandhupogiradharku Vazhiyillaadhirundhadhu.
15 andru Raaththiriyileye Naan Aatroramaaip Poi, Alangaththaip Paarvaiyittuth Thirumbi, Pallaththaakkin Vaasalvazhiyaai Vandhuvitten.

16 naan Ponadhum, Naan Seydhadhum Adhigaarigal Oruvarukkum Theriyaadhu; Adhuvaraiyilum Naan Yoodharukkaagilum, Aasaariyargal Periyavargal Adhigaarigalukkaagilum, Velaiseygira Matravargalukkaagilum Ondrum Arivikkavillai.

17 pinbu Naan Avargalai Nokki: Erusalem Paazhaayirukkiradhaiyum, Adhin Vaasalgal Akkiniyaal Sutterikkappattukkidakkiradhaiyum, Naam Irukkira Sirumaiyaiyum Paarkkireergale; Naam Ini Nindhaikkullaayiraadhapadikku, Erusalemin Alangaththaik Kattuvom Vaarungal Endru Solli,

18 en Dhevanudaiya Karam Enmel Nanmaiyaaga Irukkiradhaiyum, Raajaa Ennode Sonna Vaarththaigalaiyum Avargalukku Ariviththen; Appozhudhu Avargal: Ezhundhu Kattuvom Vaarungal Endru Solli, Andha Nalla Velaikkuth Thangal Kaigalaith Thidappaduththinaargal.

19 oroniyanaana Sanpallaaththum, Ammoniyanaana Thobiyaa Ennum Oozhiyakkaaranum, Arabiyanaana Keshemum Idhaik Kettapodhu, Engalaip Pariyaasampanni, Engalai Nindhiththu: Neengal Seygira Indhak Kaariyam Enna? Neengal Raajaavukku Virodhamaagak Kalagampannappogireergalo Endraargal.

20 adharku Naan Marumozhiyaaga: Paralogaththin Dhevanaanavar Engalukkuk Kaariyaththaik Kaikoodivarappannuvaar; Avarudaiya Oozhiyakkaararaagiya Naangal Ezhundhu Kattuvom; Ungalukkovendraal Erusalemile Pangumillai Paaththiyamumillai; Ungal Per Vilanga Ondrum Illaiyendru Avargaludane Sonnen.
